title: Aerofly.RC.7.Ultimate.Edition-RELOADED
description:
nERv 

aerofly RC 7 Ultimate Edition (c) IPACS 

11/2014 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Indie, Simulation 

Learn to fly radio controlled (R/C) models with aerofly RC 7
When it comes to learning and improving R/C flying skills, aerofly RC 7 is
the number one choice for R/C pilots. Our state of the art physics simulation
gives you a stunning level of realism. Together with our superb model details
and awesome scenery quality you will feel as if standing on a real flying
field.
You may choose from a wide variety of models, like aerobatic airplanes,
helicopters, jets, gliders, scale models and quadrocopters.
After practicing on aerofly RC 7, you'll fly confidently and instinctively at
the field.
Many features and game-like competitions will test your piloting abilities
that put real fun into your virtual flying 

This is the Ultimate edition that features more than 200 models and over
50 sceneries 

FEATURES 

Awesome sceneries with full Retina Display support
Highly detailed aircraft with state of the art physics simulation
Stunning dynamics simulation for a realistic flight feeling
Set wind and time of day for challenging training conditions
Different model types: Quadrocopters, electric and gas powered airplanes,
helicopters, gliders, jets, and scale models
Suitable for many R/C transmitters and joysticks
Fly with friends all over the world in Multiplayer Mode (Professional and
Ultimate Edition)
Ultimate Edition ( 200 models / 50 sceneries ) including additional
features like freely scalable models, aircraft editor, helicopter hover trainer
and torque-trainer. 

IMPORTANT NOTE ON USING THE RIGHT JOYSTICK, GAMEPAD OR R/C CONTROLLER
It is STRONGLY recommended to use a joystick, gamepad or dedicated R/C
controller with 4 axes. This will give you the best flying experience.
Some models ( especially helicopters ) can't be flown properly when using a
joystick with only 3 axis or less 

Visit the aerofly RC 7 website for a overview of supported input devices:
<a href="http://www.aeroflyrc.com" class="postLink" rel="nofollow">http://www.aeroflyrc.com</a> 

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
